summary.span: 命名空间提供可以在 对象上进行访问以扩展 Microsoft Office Word 文档的扩展方法。

span.span: The namespace provides extension methods that you can access on objects to extend Microsoft Office Word documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中的扩展方法是提供用于向后兼容的 Office 项目重定目标到.NET Framework 3.5 中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。The extension methods in this namespace are provided for backward compatibility with Office projects that you retarget from the .NET Framework 3.5 to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 在新项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，应使用来访问这些方法`Globals.Factory`在项目中的对象。In new projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], you should access these methods by using the `Globals.Factory` object in your project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO 加载项在运行时](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time)并[获取从文档级自定义项中的本机 Office 对象的扩展对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/76863085-5619-4964-9b82-1eeb695b63f3)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time) and [Getting Extended Objects from Native Office Objects in Document-Level Customizations](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/76863085-5619-4964-9b82-1eeb695b63f3).
